snippet: Running back David Wilson will have surgery this month to repair a herniated disk in his neck, although it is expected that he will be recovered sufficiently to play next season, the team said.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants running back David Wilson will have surgery to repair a herniated disk in his neck; is expected to recover sufficiently to play in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Running back David Wilson will have surgery this month to repair a herniated disk in his neck, although it is expected that he will be recovered sufficiently to play next season, the team said.

headline.main: Giants’ David Wilson to Have Neck Surgery
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Wilson Set For Surgery On Neck
